pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Pick wall / floor / stairs texture from a pre-set list on inspector

content.raw:
I think you can do something like the following in resources.qrc:

  <file alias='wood.jpg'>../../media/materials/textures/wood.jpg</file>
  <file alias='ceiling.jpg'>../../media/materials/textures/ceiling_tiled.jpg</file>

Then refer to the images use ":wood.jpg" and ":ceiling.jpg".
content.html:
I think you can do something like the following in resources.qrc:

<file alias='wood.jpg'>../../media/materials/textures/wood.jpg</file> <file alias='ceiling.jpg'>../../media/materials/textures/ceiling_tiled.jpg</file>

Then refer to the images use ":wood.jpg" and ":ceiling.jpg".
